messages.content: This election is a once in a generation opportunity to reshape our politics. A chance to reject the tired old politics of the two traditional parties and to support a vision for a fairer and brighter future with the Lib Dems.
A chance to change things for the better in Mount Hermon, Woking and the country. If I am elected as your MP I will fight tooth and nail for our area.
As a local councillor, and former Mayor, I have already helped many people in Woking. I care about Woking. I grew up here. It would be a great privilege to represent my home town in Parliament.

As your prospective MP I want to stop Brexit. Like the majority of people in Woking I voted Remain. I am pro-European and think Brexit is a huge mistake. This election is the public’s chance to say they have changed their mind and no longer want Brexit, by voting for the Lib Dems.
If we stop Brexit the UK will gain a £50 billion ‘Remain Bonus’. The Lib Dems will use this money to invest in public services, like our NHS and schools, and to fight the threat of climate change.
Please support me with your vote on 12th December.

PS - The Lib Dems won Woking in the most recent election, the European Parliament elections in May this year, and we are fighting hard to win again. All the predictions say this election could be really close between the Conservatives and Lib Dems so please make your vote count.
